reference.title: Glossary of Terms for the Synology WRX560
reference.shortdesc: Whether you're installing, replacing, or troubleshooting your Synology WRX560, here's some helpful terms to know!

dlentry.dd: The physical/tangible part of tech, like routers, modems and cables
The digital/intangible part of tech, like websites and computer programs
Hardware that connects and manages networks to provide an Internet connection
Hardware that converts signals between devices to maintain a stable connection
Hardware that ensures devices get the right kind of electrical power
Hardware that virtually connects devices and provides communication between them
Small colored lights on a router that 'indicate' the device's operational state
The parts of a router where additional hardware (like cables) can be plugged in
The frequency range of your Wi-Fi router, which impacts the network's speed, range, and interference susceptibility
